>
[Swift Swimmer](/Feats.aspx?ID=1061) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lizardfolk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=226" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 59 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Wetlander Lizardfolk](/Heritages.aspx?ID=53) heritage

</column>

---

You swim faster than most iruxi. Your swim Speed increases to 25 feet.
name: Swift Swimmer
